name: ai-team-mvp-project
observations: Automated bug-fixing pipeline using 16 AI agents
Uses 14-stage orchestrated workflow
Monitors GitHub issues and creates PRs automatically
Integrates with Discord for notifications
Uses Supabase for data storage
Deployed on Vercel

name: pipeline-architecture
observations: Stage 0: Intake - validates and classifies issues
Stage 1: Detective - triages bugs
Stage 2: Archaeologist - root cause analysis
Stage 3: Surgeon - implements fixes
Stage 4: Critic - code review
Stage 5: Validator - testing
Stages 6-13: QA, staging, UAT, production, monitoring, documentation

name: common-bug-pattern-null-reference
observations: Pattern: Accessing properties on null/undefined objects
Root Cause: Missing null checks or optional chaining
Solution: Add optional chaining (?.) or null guards
Affected Areas: API responses, database queries, user input

name: common-bug-pattern-async-race
observations: Pattern: Race conditions in async code
Root Cause: Missing await or improper Promise handling
Solution: Ensure proper async/await usage, use Promise.all for parallel ops
Affected Areas: Database operations, API calls, file I/O

name: discord-integration
observations: Bot token stored in DISCORD_TOKEN env var
Channel ID stored in DISCORD_CHAN_ID env var
Sends notifications for pipeline events
Can read and respond to messages
Listener active for keywords: issue, bug, help, fix, problem, error, broken
